Speed of Invaders increases as their numbers diminish

events.name: All Enemies dead?  Load Phase1 again, or Phase2, 3 etc if you have more :)

events.comment: Invaders have collided with player ship :(  Go back to Title, or a Game Over screen, Leaderboard if you have one.

objects.name: Instruction1
objects.string:
Desktop - Left, Right to move base, Ctrl or Space to Fire. 

Mobile - Use touch controls

objects.name: Instruction2
objects.string: Touch or press any key to start.

events.comment: Wait before allowing to start a new game
